title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured online shopping platform with real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and admin dashboard.
contribution: Led frontend architecture and implemented payment integration. Designed responsive UI/UX for optimal mobile shopping experience.
results: Processed $2M+ in transactions within first year
Achieved 99.9% uptime with zero payment failures
Improved conversion rate by 35% through UX optimization

title: Data Analytics Dashboard
description: Enterprise-level business intelligence dashboard providing real-time analytics, custom reports, and data visualization for executive decision making.
contribution: Architected data pipeline and visualization layer. Implemented ETL processes for multiple data sources and created interactive dashboards.
results: Reduced report generation time from hours to seconds
Integrated 10+ data sources into unified platform

title: Task Management SaaS
description: Cloud-based project management tool with team collaboration features, time tracking, and integrated communication.
contribution: Built real-time collaboration features and notification system. Designed scalable architecture supporting 10K+ concurrent users.
